statusHeader.inQueue: In Queue: {{count}} User(s) Ahead Of You

dangerousLinkModal.title: Custom Link
dangerousLinkModal.message: This link will take you to

connectionErrorModal.title: Connection Error
connectionErrorModal.deletionNotice: Your account and data will be deleted in 15 days
connectionErrorModal.ipBanNotice: Someone with the same IP has been suspended from Nerimity. Your account is not affected.

homePage.slogan: A modern and sleek chat app.
homePage.subslogan: Nerimity offers an elegant and feature-rich experience that sets it apart.

registerPage.title: Welcome to {{appName}}
registerPage.agreement: By creating an account, you agree to the Terms And Conditions and the Privacy Policy.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.passwordTooLong: Password must be less than 72 characters.

linkToGoogleDrive.body: You must link your account to Google Drive to upload large images, videos, or files

messageArea.emailNotice: Confirm your email to send messages.

bots.title: Explore - Bots
bots.noticeMessage: A bot can be bumped once every {{hours}} hours. All bumps reset every {{date}}.
bots.moderationNotice: Bots are not moderated by Nerimity. Please report bots that are malicious or break the TOS.

themes.title: Explore - Themes
themes.themesHeaderDescription: Personalise Nerimity with a custom theme.
themes.fetchThemesError: Failed to fetch themes. Please try again later.
themes.unlockDescription: Click to explore all community themes

servers.title: Explore - Servers
servers.noticeMessage: A server can be bumped once every {{hours}} hours. All bumps reset every {{date}}.
servers.moderationNotice: Servers are not moderated by Nerimity. Please report servers that break the TOS.

general.serverRenameNotice: You will lose all of the perks of having your server verified if you rename it.
general.defaultChannelDescription: New members will be directed to this channel.

role.managedByBot: This role is managed by {{botName}}. You cannot delete or add members to this role. Kick this bot to remove this role.
role.hideRoleDescription: Display members with this role along with all the default members
role.applyOnJoinDescription: Apply this role to members when they join the server.

welcomeScreen.title: Questions
welcomeScreen.description: Set up questions. Let users assign roles.

channels.createNewDescription: Create a new channel or category

channel.slowModeDescription: Specify how long a user must wait before they can send a message.

notifications.notice: These settings will only change for you.
notifications.soundDescription: Make a sound when receiving a notification.

invites.serverInvitesDescription: Invite your friends to this server.
invites.customInviteVerifiedOnlyNotice: Custom invite links are only available for verified servers.

publishServer.publishNotice: Publishing your server will make it be available in the <1>explore</1> page.
publishServer.bumpServerDescription: Bump this server to get to the top.
publishServer.bumpCooldown: You must wait {{hours}} hours, {{minutes}} minutes, and {{seconds}} seconds to bump this server.

verify.insufficientMembers: You need {{count}} more member(s) to apply for verification.
verify.verifiableDescription: You have enough members to verify your server!

requirements.title: Requirements
requirements.englishOnlyDescription: Servers that are not English are harder to moderate.
requirements.oneMonthOrSupporter: At least 1 month OR supporter badge
requirements.oneMonthOrSupporterDescription: Your server must be at least 1 month old OR the owner of the server must have the supporter badge.
requirements.membersDescription: Your server must have at least {{count}} members.
requirements.profanityFreeDescription: Server name, avatar and banner must be profanity free.
requirements.avatarAndBannerDescription: Server must have an avatar and a banner.
requirements.rulesDescription: Server must have a rules channel.

perks.title: Perks
perks.badgeDescription: A badge to show that your server is special.
perks.exploreDescription: Your server will be displayed in a separate section on the explore page.
perks.customInviteDescription: Create your own invite link from the invites page.

noInvites.title: No Invites Created
noInvites.description: You must create an invite before you can create an external embed link.

externalEmbed.title: Create External Embed Link
externalEmbed.description: Create an external IFrame embed for your website.

rolePermissions.sendMessageDescription: Enable sending messages in this server. Server admins can still send messages.
rolePermissions.manageRolesDescription: Permission for updating or deleting roles.
rolePermissions.manageChannelsDescription: Permission for updating or deleting channels.
rolePermissions.mentionEveryoneDescription: Enable mentioning @everyone. Server admins can still mention everyone.
rolePermissions.nicknameMemberDescription: Allow users to change their nickname in the server.

body.part1: Are you sure you want to leave <1>{{serverName}}</1>?

channelPermissions.publicChannelDescription: Enable access to the channel. Server admins can access any channel.
channelPermissions.sendMessageDescription: Enable sending messages in the channel. Server admins can still send messages.
channelPermissions.joinVoiceDescription: Enable joining voice channels in the channel. Server admins can still join voice channels.

language.reloadNotice: You must reload the app to fully apply the new language.
language.searchNotice: Translations are maintained by the community. Please report any translations that are incorrect or inappropriate to Nerimity.

account.palestineBorder: Add Palestine border to your avatar.
account.newPasswordDescription: Changing your password will log you out everywhere else.
account.enterCode: Enter the 5 digit code sent to your email:
account.channelNoticeDescription: Shows when the user is about to chat for the first time. Changes apply after reload.
account.channelNoticeTooLong: Channel notice cannot be longer than 300 characters.
account.deleteAccountNotice: You must leave/delete all servers before you can delete your account.
account.deletionNotice: We're sad to see you go :( If you didn't like something, please let us know in the official Nerimity server.
account.postsAndMessagesNotice: Your posts and messages may take weeks to delete.

badges.notice: Support this project by donating money.
badges.palestineDescription: Can be equipped by going to profile settings

lastOnline.title: Last Online Time
lastOnline.description: Set who can see your last online time.

directMessage.title: Direct Message
directMessage.description: Set who can send you direct messages.

friendRequest.title: Friend Request
friendRequest.description: Set who can send you friend requests.

profileOptions.title: Profile Options
profileOptions.hideFollowersDescription: Hide your followers from your profile.
profileOptions.hideFollowingDescription: Hide users you are following from your profile.

notifications.desktopNotificationsDescription: Show desktop notifications even when the app is minimised.
notifications.soundsDescription: If the notification sounds are too annoying, you can disable them.
notifications.volumeDescription: Change the volume of the notification sounds.
notifications.changeSoundsDescription: Change the sound of notifications with these royalty-free sounds.

call.nextCallNotice: Changes will be applied on your next calls.
call.leaveCall: You must leave the call first
call.downloadAppNotice: Download the Nerimity desktop app to use this feature without window tab focus.

connections.googleDescription: Linking your Google account will allow you to upload files in Nerimity. Files will be stored in your Google Drive.

interface.customCSSWarning: Do not paste code from people you don't trust.
interface.themesDescription: Pick a preset theme or reset to default.
interface.enableErudaDescription: Enable Eruda for debugging. Do not share any details with others.
interface.blurEffectDescription: Toggle blur effect on interface elements. (May Reduce Performance)
interface.disableAdvancedMarkupBarDescription: Prevent the advanced markup bar from appearing.
interface.swipeToOpenDescription: Open the right drawer by swiping from the right edge. This will disable swipe to reply.
interface.headerTapToOpenDescription: Open the right drawer by clicking on the header. This will enable swipe to reply.
interface.customizeColorsDescription: Edit colours for the current theme.
interface.12HourFormatDescription: Display time in 12-hour format with AM/PM.

window.downloadAppNotice: To modify these settings, you must download the Nerimity desktop app.
window.startMinimizedDescription: Minimise Nerimity to the tray automatically.
window.reopenAppNotice: You must reopen the app for the change to take effect.

activity.extensionDescription: Our RPC extension allows you to share your activity from Spotify and YouTube with users on Nerimity!
activity.activityStatusDescription: Share what you're up to with everyone
activity.discordActivityDescription: Share your Discord activity with users on Nerimity

serverModal.text: Please join the Discord server to enable Activity Sharing.

bot.publishBotDescription: Publish your bot to the explore page so other users can find it.
bot.publishNotice: Publishing your bot will make it be available in the <1>explore</1> page.
bot.bumpBotDescription: Bump this bot to get it to the top
bot.bumpBotCooldown: You must wait {{hours}} hours, {{minutes}} minutes, and {{seconds}} seconds to bump this bot.

deleteApplication.title: Delete Application
deleteApplication.willNotGetDeletedDescription: You may manually delete them before deleting your app.

experiments.noExperiments: There are currently no experiments available.

reloadRequired.title: Reload Required
reloadRequired.body: Nerimity needs to be restarted for changes to take effect.

supportBlock.supportDescription: Donate to get a supporter badge!

joinServerModal.notice: If you would like to explore servers, please go to the explore tab instead.
joinServerModal.missingInvite: Please enter a server invite code.

messageView.noMessagesDescription: There are no messages in this channel.

flaggedServer.title: Schedule Delete
flaggedServer.description: This server did not comply with our Terms of Service and will be deleted soon.

nicknameChangeModal.title: Update Server Profile
nicknameChangeModal.description: Everyone in this server will see this nickname.

transferOwnershipModal.title: Transfer Ownership
transferOwnershipModal.description: This will transfer ownership to a new owner.

errors.colonInUsername: Username must not contain a colon.
